title: Canggu Beach Vibes (Half-day)
overview: Discover Canggu's trendy surf scene, hip cafes, and black sand beach.

stops.description: Arrive and enjoy surfing or relaxing on the black sand.
Grab coffee or brunch at a local café.
Explore Canggu's street art and murals.

title: Canggu Surf & Explore (Full-day)
overview: A day of surfing, café hopping, and sunset at Canggu Beach.

stops.description: Take a surf lesson or relax on the sand.
Enjoy brunch or coffee at a trendy spot.
Chill at a beach bar and watch the sunset.
